Txt_Dlc_Not_Open_Treasure_1.Text: {LEADER} tries to open the treasure chest.

Txt_Dlc_Not_Open_Treasure_2.Text: However, it looks like it's locked.

Txt_Dlc_Not_Open_Treasure_3.Text: You can claim various bonus items from this chest if you pre-ordered the game or bought it from certain shops.

Txt_Dlc_Not_Open_Treasure_4.Text:
For more details, pay a visit to the website of the shop you bought
DRAGON QUEST III HD-2D Remake from, or read the instructions for obtaining your bonus items.

Txt_Dlc_Dlc_Choice.Text: Which item kit would you like?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Dlc_Confirm_Receipt.Text:
Are you sure you want <IndefSgl_WORD>?
(If your companions have no room for more items, and you have over 999 of any of the items in the kit, they will be discarded.)
